modName: Nocturnals Robes and Cowl - Replaces Forsworn Chest and Head
summary: Nocturnal\'s Robes and Cowl from in-game.
descriptionHtml:
I wasn\'t able to spawn these with item codes, so I extracted the files and replaced Forsworn Chest and Head with them. The cowl hides hair. I\'m not sure how to change that--it\'d probably clip anyway, but if a modder has any suggestion I\'ll try it out.

---

Install:

Copy Data folder and paste over your Skyrim Data folder.

Credits:

Bethesda for Skyrim and all its assets.
author: Reddimus
